name: Angie Nyx's Ideal SRPG
description:
This game is a tactical RPG set in a fantasy world with deep political intrigue, but instead of the monarchy, you play as the civilians, having to live with the cruel choices of those in power. It has a largely scripted story, with new chapters releasing every month or two, but your choices will affect the world, other characters, and how the gods perceive you.

You play here as a trans person coming into their own after escaping a repressive cult in a deeply conservative country. Act Zero is called "Self" and focuses on your character finding themselves, grappling with dysphoria and religious trauma, while later acts will take a political turn examining government, ideals, and national identity.

The Prologue chapter is now available!
